document.full_text: washington nationals infielder jerry hairston has been suspended one game and fined an undisclosed amount for "aggressive actions" in a game against the san diego padres, major league baseball said on sunday.
document.title: nats' hairston banned one game for "aggressive actions"
lines_and_colors: washington nationals infielder jerry hairston has been suspended one game and fined an undisclosed amount for "aggressive actions" in a game against the san diego padres, major league baseball said on sunday.
